00038 template<class Star> class StarList : public list <CountedRef<Star> >  {
00039  
00040 public:
00041 typedef CountedRef<Star> Element;
00042 typedef typename list<Element>::const_iterator StarCIterator;
00043 typedef typename list<Element>::iterator StarIterator;
00044 
00045 
00046 /* constructors */
00048   StarList() : list<Element>() {};
00049 
00051 
00054   StarList(const string &FileName); 
00056 
00061   int  write(const string &FileName);
00062 
00064   int read(const string &FileName);
00065 
00066 
00067   void push_back(Star* t) {list<Element>::push_back(Element(t));} 
00068   /* the previous one hides the following one ?! */
00069   void push_back(const Element& e) {list<Element>::push_back(e);}
00070 
00071 
00072 /* destructor */
00073   virtual ~StarList() {};
00074 
00075   
00077  void dump(ostream &stream = cout ) const { 
00078     for (StarCIterator p = begin(); 
00079          p !=end(); ++p) (*p)->dump(stream);}
00080 
00082 
00084   // le premier de la liste a le plus grand flux
00085   void FluxSort() { sort(&DecreasingFlux);}
00086 
00088   void ExtractHead(StarList<Star> &Out, int NHead) const;
00089 
00091   void CutTail(const int NKeep);
00092 
00094   void ExtractInFrame(StarList<Star> &Out, const Frame &aFrame) const;
00096   void CutEdges(const Frame &aFrame, float mindist);
00097 
00099   void CopyTo(StarList<Star> &Copy) const;
00100 
00102   void ClearList() { CutTail(0);};
00103 
00105 
00107   template<class Operator> void ApplyTransfo(const Operator &Op) 
00108     {for (StarIterator p = begin(); p !=end(); ++p) (*p)->Apply(Op);}
00109 
00111   Star* FindClosest(double X, double Y) const;
00112 
00114   Star* FindClosest(const Point &P) const { return FindClosest(P.x, P.y);};
00115 
00116 #ifndef __CINT__
00117 
00118   bool HasCloseNeighbor(double X, double Y, double maxdist, double mindist=0.1) const;
00119 
00121   bool HasCloseNeighbor(const Point &P, double maxdist, double mindist=0.1) const
00122    {return HasCloseNeighbor(P.x, P.y, maxdist, mindist);}
00123 
00125   Star* ClosestNeighbor(double X, double Y, double mindist=0.1) const;
00126 
00128   Star* ClosestNeighbor(const Point &P, double mindist=0.1) const
00129    {return ClosestNeighbor(P.x, P.y, mindist);}
00130 
00131   int NumberOfNeighbors(const double &X, const double &Y, const double &distmax) const;
00132   int AllNeighbors(StarList &NeighborList, const double &X, const double &Y, const double &distmax) const;
00133   int AllNeighbors(StarList &NeighborList, const Point &Pt, const double &distmax) const
00134   {return AllNeighbors(NeighborList, Pt.x, Pt.y, distmax);}
00135   int NumberOfNeighbors(const Point &Pt, const double &distmax) const
00136   {return NumberOfNeighbors(Pt.x, Pt.y, distmax);}
00137 #endif

00165 template <class Star>  ostream & operator <<(ostream &stream, const StarList<Star> &List) 
00166     {List.dump(stream); return stream; };
